profile.name: Anshul Dev
profile.tagline: A Graphic Designer & Web Developer trying to understand the dark arts of Backend. Because who needs sleep, right?
profile.about_text:
Sup mate! Iâ€™m a Developer who enjoys solving complex problems, creating impactful and user-centered experiences across multiple platforms that are informed by research and data. 

 I'm probably not the typical designer positioned behind an Illustrator artboard adjusting pixels, but I design. Immersed in stylesheets tweaking font sizes and contemplating layouts is where you'll find me. I'm committed to creating fluent user experiences while staying fashionable. 

 When it comes to business, first impressions matter, and good website design is the key to capitalizing on them. An excellent site is not judged solely on its looks, but on its functionality and usability as well. My experience as a programmer allows me to come up with intelligent solutions to technical challenges, while at the same time designing sleek and visually appealing websites

projects.title: The DailyDose
projects.content: The DailyDose is a news website that provides the latest news and updates from around the world. It is a one-stop destination for all your news needs.

projects.title: Fitness Junction
projects.content: Fitness Junction is Comprehensive library of exercises catering to all fitness enthusiasts. It can be used by anyone who wants to get fit and healthy.

projects.title: Trippy Travels
projects.content: Trippy Travels is a travel website that provides the best travel destinations and travel packages. Most of the travel packages are customizable and can be tailored to the needs of the customer.

projects.title: Movies Hub
projects.content: Movies Hub is a movie info website that provides the latest movies and TV shows related information. It is a one-stop destination for all your movie needs.
